CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Bulk heterojunction ( BHJ ) photovoltaic device combining P3HT as the electron donor with [6,6]-phenyl C 61 butyric acid methyl ester ( PCBM ) as the electron acceptor have achieved power conversion efficiencies ( PCEs ) as high as 4-5 % .

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| P3HT |
| PCBM |

In the given paragraph, the two "Material Name" entities are:

1. P3HT (poly(3-hexylthiophene)) - an electron donor material in the bulk heterojunction photovoltaic device.
2. PCBM ([6,6]-phenyl C 61 butyric acid methyl ester) - an electron acceptor material in the bulk heterojunction photovoltaic device.
